member.name: T:MusicPlayerBackend.SoundEngine
member.summary: Implements for handling of audiofiles and communication to audiodevices. The underlying API can be subject to change, but the output and consistensy will remain. Playing happens async.

member.name: T:MusicPlayerBackend.Globals
member.remarks: Usually only primitive types which are used in multiple places in code, but are not changed by the user or by the programm.

member.name: P:MusicPlayerBackend.Globals.SettingsPath
member.summary: Holds the path to the programms config file.

member.name: T:MusicPlayerBackend.APPLICATION_STYLE
member.summary: Represents the available Styles in an Typesafe manner.

member.name: T:MusicPlayerBackend.AudioDeviceModel
